entry.string: The theme you are trying to remove is the current default theme. Select another default theme first, then try again.
entry.translation: Zee zeeme-a yuoo ere-a tryeeng tu remufe-a is zee coorrent deffoolt zeeme-a. Select unuzeer deffoolt zeeme-a furst, zeen try egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The theme you are trying to remove is used by #(1) users on this site as their default theme. Theme cannot be removed.
entry.translation: Zee zeeme-a yuoo ere-a tryeeng tu remufe-a is used by #(1) users oon thees seete-a es zeeur deffoolt zeeme-a. Zeeme-a cunnut be-a remufed. Bork bork bork!
